dublin_core.dcvalue: An increase in Ornithine Decarboxylase ODC activity was reported in L929 murine fibroblast cells after exposure to a digital cellular telephone signal This result was not confirmed by several other studies including the one reported in a companion paper As a partner in the Perform B programme we extended this study to human neuroblastoma cells SH SY5Y using well defined waveguide systems to imitate exposure to radiofrequency radiation RFR Digital Advanced Mobile Phone System DAMPS or Global System for Mobile communications GSM signals emitted by mobile phones
Effects of exposure to DAMPS and GSM signals on ornithine decarboxylase (ODC) activity: II. SH-SY5Y human neuroblastoma cells.
